column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque has pretty decent food. The grilled chicken was moist and had good flavor with a nice skin
column4: were nicely smoked with a nice rub seasoning but unfortunately
column6: with the exception of the first piece which was hot
column8: was a bit dry. That all being said
column9: this is probably the best smoked meat bbq I've found in Illinois
column11: overcooked rib eater. Service was efficient. The facility is small and not too much to get excited about. I have sat inside and out and if the weather is accommodating
